help.description: DMs this message to the requester. Please do `help <command>` to get more details.

tag.description: Posts an embed in chat with the given details provided in the config file.

warn.description: Performs the specified action to the targeted user. **Mod roles only**.

details.description: Add a new warning to the specified user.
Remove the oldest warning attached to the user.
Remove the newest warning attached to the user.
View the number of warnings attached to the user.

role.description: Performs the specified action with the named role to the user that sent the message.

details.description: Add the specified role to the requesting user.
Remove the specified role from the requesting user.
List all the available roles that can be added or removed. Does not require a target role.
